arts.ttl: Video highlights of Portugal vs Armenia (9-1), A flurry of goals, including a hat-trick from Neves!
arts.sum: Below you’ll find a video summary of the Portugal vs. Armenia match, featuring goals from Renato Veiga, Gonçalo Ramos, João Neves, Bruno Fernandes, and Francisco Conceição. As part of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers, Portugal faced Armenia at the Estádio do Dragão this Sunday. Three Paris Saint-Germain players were involved in this match, all playing […]

arts.ttl: Portugal vs Armenia – Official lineups: Ramos joins Vitinha and Neves
arts.sum: As part of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers, Portugal will be at the Estádio do Dragão this Sunday (kick-off at 3 pm, CET) to face Armenia. Three Paris Saint-Germain players are involved in this match, all on the Portuguese side: Vitinha (25-year-old midfielder), João Neves (21-year-old midfielder), and Gonçalo Ramos (24-year-old striker). arts.ttl: Portugal vs Armenia – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Portugal will take on Armenia at Estádio do Dragão this Sunday, aiming to secure a win that would guarantee their spot at the 2026 World Cup. The hosts are eager to recover from a shock defeat to the Republic of Ireland on Thursday, which ended their long unbeaten streak. arts.ttl: Portugal vs Armenia – World Cup qualifier preview and team news
arts.sum: Portugal host Armenia in their final World Cup qualifier on Sunday as they look to book their spot at next summer’s tournament in North America.
